document.masterDocTitle: Elmidae Curtis, 1830 (Coleoptera, Polyphaga, Byrrhoidea) of the Neotropical region

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Elmidae Curtis, 1830 (Coleoptera, Polyphaga, Byrrhoidea) of the Neotropical region

mods:name.mods:namePart: Passos, Maria Ines Da Silva Dos

subSubSection.paragraph: COSTA RICA : Puntarenas: Canoas, Volcán, San José—Spangler and Santiago-Fragoso ( 1992 ). MEXICO : Veracruz: Catemaco José—Spangler and Santiago-Fragoso ( 1992 ), Spangler and Staines ( 2003 ). PANAMA : Chiriquí: David, Bambito, Boquete, Caldera, Concepción, Arena Fortuna , Dolega, Guabala, Horqueta, Pueblo Nuevo, Cocle: El Valle, Penonome, Herrera: Los Pozos, Cerro Azul, Chepo, Chorrera, Pacora, Veraguas: Jorones, Sona—Spangler and Santiago-Fragoso ( 1992 ), Spangler and Staines ( 2003 ).

Hexanchorus cordillierae
(GuérIn-MénevIlle, 1843 )
Potamophilus cordillierae Guérin-Méneville, 1843 : 19
Hexanchorus cordillierae
?
COLOMBIA : Rio Chipalo—Guérin-Méneville ( 1843 )
VENEZUELA : Guayabita Creek, Aragua , Turmero—Maier ( 2013 ).
COSTA RICA : San José: San Isidro, Alajuela: Barranca, Guanacaste: Puntarenas: Volcán—Spangler and Santiago- Fragoso ( 1992 ).
PANAMA : Chiriquí: Bodega, Concepción, Guabala, Pueblo Nuevo—Spangler and Santiago-Fragoso ( 1992 ).

Hexanchorus falconensis MaIer, 2013
Hexanchorus falconensis Maier, 2013 : 46
VENEZUELA : Falcón—Maier ( 2013 ).

Hexanchorus flintorum Maier, 2013 : 49
VENEZUELA : Mérida—Maier ( 2013 ).
BRAZIL : Rio de Janeiro: Angra dos Reis, Maricá—Passos et al . ( 2009 ). COSTA RICA : San José—Hinton ( 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).

GUATEMALA : Suchitepequez—Spangler and Santiago-Fragoso ( 1992 ). MEXICO : Chinantla, Temascaltepec, Real de Arriba,Veracruz: Balzapote, Catemaco, Tejupilco, Morelos, Cuernavaca—Sharp ( 1882 ), Hinton ( 1940 d), Spangler and Santiago-Fragoso ( 1992 ). PANAMA : Bugaba—Sharp ( 1887 ), Hinton ( 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).
VENEZUELA : Amazonas, Marahuaka—Maier ( 2013 ).
VENEZUELA : Amazonas—Maier ( 2013 ).

Hexanchorus shannoni Spangler & StaInes, 2003
Hexanchorus shannoni Spangler & Staines, 2003 : 45
ARGENTINA : Missiones—Spangler and Staines ( 2003 ), Manzo and Archangelsky ( 2012 ).
BRAZIL : Santa Catarina: Nova Teutônia—Hinton ( 1937 b, 1940 d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ), Spangler and Staines ( 2003 ).
BOLIVIA : Cochabamba—Hinton (1935, 1940d), Blackwelder ( 1944 ), Spangler and Staines ( 2003 ), Manzo and Moya, 2010 .
PERU : Tingo Maria—Spangler ( 1966 ).
COSTA RICA : Alajuela: Alajuela, Cartago: La Suiza , Guanacaste: Cañas, Heredia: Barba, Limón: Guapiles, Puntarenas: Esparta, San José: Grecia—Spangler and Santiago-Fragoso ( 1992 ).

PANAMA : Cocle: El Valle, Bocas del Toro: Pipeline, Punta Pena, Zegla, Chiriquí: Bambito, Boquete, Cerro Punta, Cuenca Fortuna , Quebrada Arena, Guabala, Horqueta– Spangler and Santiago-Fragoso ( 1992 ).
